title: Most WTF game you have played?
body:
I think this one takes number 1 for me like WTF I can't even.
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78462661/200432084?tab
Legit the enemy tried to invade and lost the invade but they just kept coming over and over I wasn't even level 2 yet and I had like 5 kills or something fucking ridiculous their invade lasted a total of like 5 minutes and even once they got blue they died with it 2 seconds after anyway.

replies.body: Was playing ranked todfay and the other team just let us take drags and barons was weird they weren't even behind

> [{quoted}](name=Winter Fox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=scfyJdqG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-08T13:04:17.931+0000)
>
> Was playing ranked todfay and the other team just let us take drags and barons was weird they weren't even behind

same happened to me on norms just then we got 5 drags free and they had a 600 stack nasus but dragon buff OP and we won
Yeah, it was like as if they were just giving me the win tybg

> [{quoted}](name=Winter Fox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=scfyJdqG,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T13:39:09.433+0000)
>
> Yeah, it was like as if they were just giving me the win tybg

And this was on a Diamond game? It must be Diamonds Normals I guess.

Or else all the peoples must be drunk, elo boosted or lost interest in the game and gave up. xd

I had a game where my ADC was AFK and I was support Morgana. I got 22 kills, but my CS was bad.
I lost the game.
Must have been my CS.

I played a game where I ended up splitpushing with Vlad.
It wasn't intentional at first but I was pushing top and I noticed that all my enemies were either mid or bot.
I decided that my team could hold the turrets while I pushed and the funny thing was that no-one came to stop me until I was onto the inhibitor turret. I bought myself a lich bane for better turret pushing abilities and then I took bot lane turret until I got to the inhibitor turret. I had initially been reluctant to join teamfights because they an 8/0 Vayne by maybe 15 minutes. 
Either way somehow the game ended up turning around for a victory.
all games are wtf games when you're me.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78238817/200636633 had 2 open inhibs 1 nexus turrent down the kept trying to back door got ace pushed mid got both nexus towers had another back door try got 4 down there sup was still up ran to nexus throw down e and end was back and forward late game but they stomped early
I had a game today, we were 3 inhibs down, they still had all inhib turrets up. Still managed to win somehow o.O
